title: Stack
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
abstract: Burnley - Images inside the CityLink Tunnel and emissions stack.
description: In 'Stack', sound artist Ros Bandt captures sounds from the city stack emissions, a 55 metre chimney stack that extracts fumes from the Citylink tunnel. Sounds from the cylinder, the external grid and internal resonant surfaces, along with ambient sounds of the industrial extractor fans and builders working were recorded. Sections of the steel frame were electrified in order to generate original percussion timbres. The tunnel footage was shot and edited by Martin Wright.
